DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy , safety survival two treatment regimen : Continuous Intermittent Maximum Androgen Blockade , use goserelin bicalutamide patient prostate cancer . Primary endpoint time progression . Fifteen patient evaluate . QoL evaluation also include .
